GSD.description:
block: Fix wrong offset in bio_truncate()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.96 by commit b63e120189fd92aff00096d11e2fc5253f60248b. For more details please see the references link.
